scripts.cy:run:report: cypress run && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/merged-report.json && npx marge cypress/reports/merged-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --inline
scripts.generate-report: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/merged-report.json && npx marge cypress/reports/merged-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --inline
